get.summary: View a list of room sessions.

parameters.name: filter[date_created_at][eq]
parameters.description: ISO 8601 date for filtering room sessions created on that date.

parameters.name: filter[date_created_at][gte]
parameters.description: ISO 8601 date for filtering room sessions created after that date.

parameters.name: filter[date_created_at][lte]
parameters.description: ISO 8601 date for filtering room sessions created before that date.

parameters.name: filter[date_updated_at][eq]
parameters.description: ISO 8601 date for filtering room sessions updated on that date.

parameters.name: filter[date_updated_at][gte]
parameters.description: ISO 8601 date for filtering room sessions updated after that date.

parameters.name: filter[date_updated_at][lte]
parameters.description: ISO 8601 date for filtering room sessions updated before that date.

parameters.name: filter[date_ended_at][eq]
parameters.description: ISO 8601 date for filtering room sessions ended on that date.

parameters.name: filter[date_ended_at][gte]
parameters.description: ISO 8601 date for filtering room sessions ended after that date.

parameters.name: filter[date_ended_at][lte]
parameters.description: ISO 8601 date for filtering room sessions ended before that date.

parameters.name: filter[active]
parameters.description: Filter active or inactive room sessions.

parameters.name: include_participants
parameters.description: To decide if room participants should be included in the response.
